articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message extended warm congratulations and comradely greetings to Raul Castro Ruz on his birthday and sincerely wished him good heath and greater success in his responsible work for leading the Cuban party, government and people.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Jordan
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Jordan
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on June 1 sent a congratulatory message to Hani Mulqi on his appointment as prime minister of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
					The message wished him good health and success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the governments and peoples of the two countries would favorably develop.

articles.title: Myanmar President Reiterates His Will to Boost Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Myanmar President Reiterates His Will to Boost Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Jong Ho Bom, DPRK ambassador to Myanmar, presented his credentials to Htin Kyaw, president of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, on May 30.
					 Noting that the two countries have maintained solid and good relations, the Myanmar president said that his government would value and steadily boost the relations with the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of Chongryon Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Chongryon Officials Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Jong Tong Ju, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The members of the delegation visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum which houses historical materials and relics associated with revolutionary activities of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic career of his family members in Mangyongdae, the guests went round the historical relics preserved at the old home with much care.
					
					 They also visited the Sci-Tech Complex, Pyongyang Catfish Farm, Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory, etc.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The delegates to the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders reflecting the minds of all KCU members and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Provincial Masses Vow to Become Victors in 200-day Campaign
articles.content:
Provincial Masses Vow to Become Victors in 200-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in South Phyongan, South Hwanghae, Jagang and South Hamgyong provinces on Thursday and Friday to vow to successfully implement the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and become honorable victors in the 200-day campaign.
					 Present there were officials of the local party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, working people and youths and students.
					
					 Reports were made there to be followed by speeches of the representatives of workers, agricultural workers, youths and intellectuals.
					
					 The reporters and speakers called on officials, party members and working people to steadily register fresh records and speeds in the advance of the 200-day campaign along the path indicated by the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The campaign is the party-wide, nationwide and all-people general offensive which would demonstrate once again the spirit and might of the Korean people making uninterrupted innovation and advance by getting united around the great party in one mind, they noted.
					
					 They called on the officials, party members and working people to turn out as one in the 200-day campaign in response to the call of the party and work miracles and innovations on all major fronts.
					
					 They also called for making a breakthrough in achieving the goals of five-year strategy for the state economic development through the accurately targeted method of political and ideological offensive in every part of working sites of 200-day campaign.
					
					 They appealed to turn out in the on-going heroic advance and drive and thus contribute to bringing earlier the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution by making continuous innovation, advance and attack.
					
					 The rallies were followed by demonstrations.

articles.title: National Children's Science Fictions and Models Exhibition-2016 Opens
articles.content:
National Children's Science Fictions and Models Exhibition-2016 Opens
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The National Children's Science Fictions and Models Exhibition-2016 opened with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Friday on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Korean Children's Union.
					 Exibited there were more than 310 pieces of creation presented by schoolchildren across the country.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials of the youth league, and schoolchildren in Pyongyang.

articles.title: 70th Founding Anniversary of Minju Joson Observed
articles.content:
70th Founding Anniversary of Minju Joson Observed
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson, the organ of the DPRK government, marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung established the paper on June 4, Juche 35 (1946) and named it Minju Joson, indicating principles to be adhered to in editing and publishing the newspaper in every period and at every stage of the developing revolution and the tasks to do so and wisely leading its journalists, editors and employees to successfully perform their revolutionary duty.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the newspaper into a powerful media speaking for the stand of the DPRK government.
					
					 It has successfully carried out its duty by covering the proud road of victory under the loving care and guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu for the past seven decades.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place at the People's Palace of Culture Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, journalists, editors and employees of the newspaper.
					
					 A report was delivered at the meeting to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science
articles.content:
Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The 18th Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science of Koreans at Home and Abroad took place at the Sci-Tech Complex in Pyongyang.
					 Enunciated at the symposium were various noteworthy papers including "Research into Early Diagnosis of Chronic Nephropathy," "Research into Improved Surgical Operation of Cervical Spondylosis" and "Global Efforts to Meet Demand for Surgical Treatment."
					
					 The floor was taken by Ri Yong, head of department of Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University, Son Il Gyong, vice-director of Kim Man Yu Hospital, Kim Myong Jun, a researcher of the Tumor Institute of the Academy of Medical Science, Park Kee Bum, head of a delegation of the Korean Medical Association in the U.S., and other doctors at home and abroad.
					
					 The symposium served as a significant occasion to share achievements and experience gained in developing the nation's medical science.

articles.title: Tele-education System for Teachers Established
articles.content:
Tele-education System for Teachers Established
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Tele-education College under Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in the DPRK has concentrated efforts on in-service course for those at teacher-training schools across the country.
					 The university established a tele-education system for teachers in service in April to steadily improve their quality. The system helps educational officials and teachers get a course on necessary subjects at any time.
					
					 According to an official concerned, nearly 200 teachers in service have already finished the in-service training curriculum.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Make Bold Decision to Clear Hurdles in Way of Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Make Bold Decision to Clear Hurdles in Way of Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities should clearly understand the wishes of the fellow countrymen, face up to the trend of the times and make a bold decision of eliminating legal and institutional mechanisms standing in the way of national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 To remove all legal and institutional mechanisms blocking dialogue, contacts, exchange and cooperation between the north and the south and escalating confrontation is prerequisite to improving the inter-Korean relations, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 First of all, it is necessary to abolish fascist laws which antagonize compatriots and suppress the reunification movement and to dismantle repressive machines against reunification.
					
					 The "Security Law" in south Korea is an anachronistic and outrageous fascist law as it bars the nation from achieving reconciliation and unity, blocks the national reunification movement and stirs up distrust and confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities are further freezing the inter-Korean relations by enacting new fascist laws in a bid to suppress progressive democratic forces aspiring after reunification and escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that it is impossible to build confidence and achieve unity between the north and the south and confrontation would be escalated between them unless those anti-reunification laws are repealed in south Korea.
					
					 It is also necessary to dismantle as early as possible repressive machines against reunification as they throw artificial obstacles in the way of dialogue, cooperation, reconciliation and unity between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should prudently accept the bold and patriotic proposal of the DPRK, away from the outdated conception of confrontation.
					
					 The north and the south should not allow the bedeviled inter-Korean relations to go on any longer but defuse confrontation and bring about a fresh phase in national reunification as early as possible.

articles.title: Inevitable Is Imperialist Reactionary Forces' Decline and Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Inevitable Is Imperialist Reactionary Forces' Decline and Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- No matter what desperate efforts the imperialist reactionary forces may make, they will not help stop going to ruin, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 This is proved by the decline and ruin of the U.S., the boss of the imperialist reactionary forces, it notes, adding:
					
					 Having grown extremely arrogant since the demise of the Cold War, the U.S. imperialists have resorted to high-handed and arbitrary practices, disclosing their undisguised wild ambition to dominate the world, and perpetrated aggression and conspiratorial acts to bring down sovereign states in different parts of the world.
					
					 Human history knows not a few aggressors who attempted to dominate the world but in no time they have ever succeeded in putting the whole world under control.
					
					 This goes to prove that the aggressor forces' policy of strength is bound to go bankrupt.
					
					 The U.S. decline and ruin find their manifestation in various aspects. The role played by the U.S. as "superpower" does not go down with anyone in the international arena. War of aggression, military pressure, interference in internal affairs of other countries, economic sanctions, etc., are main factors of leading the U.S. structure of hegemony to an end.
					
					 The U.S. military muscle which it considers as an important pillar for dominating the world fails to prevent the American Empire from collapsing.
					
					 The policy of strength has brought the U.S. economy to the brink of bankruptcy. 
					
					 Multi-polarization making dynamic progress worldwide is precipitating the collapse of the American Empire hour by hour.
					
					 The U.S. hegemony-dominated international order based on the nuclear edge is falling down owing to the DPRK's status as a power.
					
					 The fall of the American Empire is a stern sentence passed by history.
					
					 Inevitable is the U.S. decline and ruin as it regards the policy of strength as all-powerful.

articles.title: Construction Site of Subway Collapses, Causing Casualties in S. Korea
articles.content:
Construction Site of Subway Collapses, Causing Casualties in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- An explosion occurred while laborers were at work in a construction site of a subway in Namyangju City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea on Wednesday, causing the site to collapse, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Four workers were killed and ten others wounded.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Authorities' Human Rights Abuses against Prisoner of Conscience
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Authorities' Human Rights Abuses against Prisoner of Conscience
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations against Suppression under the Pretext of Public Security in south Korea held a press conference on June 1 denouncing the puppet authorities for their crackdown upon a member of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The speakers said at the conference that the member of the solidarity who is in confinement is staging a hunger strike at the risk of his life in protest against the unreasonable judgment of the court.
					
					 He should not be allowed to serve a prison term as an operation had been conducted on him for tumor, they noted.
					
					 They strongly demanded the authorities stop labeling him "pro-north element" and immediately release the hunger striker at once.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Move for Establishing Laboratory for Biochemical Weapons Protested by S. Korean Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Move for Establishing Laboratory for Biochemical Weapons Protested by S. Korean Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations in Pusan, south Korea are staging a widespread action denouncing the U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea for their moves for a biochemical war, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 More than 70 civic and social organizations including the Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Pusan Federation of Women's Organizations, the Pusan Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions formed a preparatory committee of the Pusan Citizens' Measure Committee against Establishment of the Biochemical Weapon Laboratory in Pusan on Thursday.
					
					 They held an inaugural ceremony before dock No. 8 in Pusan Port, the one for exclusive use by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 At the ceremony speakers said that the U.S. is mulling establishing a laboratory for biochemical weapons in Pusan under such absurd reasons as "importance of the military port and populous area" even though the truth behind the incident of introduction of anthrax germs has not yet been probed.
					
					 They clarified that they would stage action not only in Pusan but also in all other parts of south Korea until the plan for testing the biochemical weapons is withdrawn.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Authorities of Implementing Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Authorities of Implementing Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore Wednesday in an editorial denounced the authorities for implementing the humiliating "agreement" on sexual slavery.
					 It accused the "government" of having officially established the preparatory committee for setting up the "foundation for comfort women" on May 31. 
					
					 Referring to the solidarity statement critical of the "agreement" issued on May 30 by 15 research institutions representing Japanese historical circles, the editorial underscored the need to re-negotiate the settlement of issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by British Body
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted the full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on its website on May 31.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also indicates the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever.

articles.title: Crucial Report of KPA Supreme Command and Notice of KPA General Staff Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Crucial Report of KPA Supreme Command and Notice of KPA General Staff Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on May 28 in support of the crucial report issued by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and notice sent by the KPA General Staff.
					 The statement said:
					
					  The south Korean military gangsters committed such grave military provocation as intruding into the southwestern waters of the West Sea under the DPRK side's control and firing shells at a ferryboat of the Navy of the KPA on a routine duty.
					
					 The KPA Supreme Command and General Staff warned the south Korean puppet forces of their provocation.
					
					 In the future, the KPA will open direct fire on any warship of the south Korean puppet forces without warning, if it intrudes into the extension of the Military Demarcation Line of the sea waters even 0.001 mm in the hotspot of the West Sea.
					
					 It is a hackneyed trick of the south Korean puppet forces to inveigle the DPRK into a provocation case by pushing the situation to an extreme phase and then mislead the public opinion through propaganda that the incident was provoked by the latter.
					
					 The DPRK will never allow the provocation by the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the south Korean war maniacs for their fresh military provocation.
					
					 We fully support the crucial report of the KPA Supreme Command and notice sent by the KPA General Staff.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on May 27 in support of a statement issued by the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC).
					 The joint statement recalled that the Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK in a statement on May 25 urged the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It accused the U.S. of still insisting on "north Korea's denuclearization first and halt to the pressure on it next" while being seized with its Cold War-way of thinking. It went on:
					
					 This is an unacceptable "logic" as it seeks the DPRK's disarmament.
					
					 The Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK warned that the U.S. reckless moves to isolate and stifle the former would only invite bitter disgrace and dear price.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that the "collapse" of the DPRK is impossible and the latter will certainly emerge victorious in every confrontation with the hostile forces, properly looking back upon the several decades-long history of its hostile policy toward the latter including its defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 If the U.S. has neither ability nor intention to recognize reality and respect the DPRK, it will suffer only bitter defeat in the future, too.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, normalize the relations with it and replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					En su misiva el remitente envio la calida felicitacion y saludo camaraderil al destinatario que celebra el cumpleanos.
					
					Deseo a su homologo cubano buena salud y mayores exitos en las labores responsables para dirigir el partido, gobierno y pueblo de Cuba.

articles.title: Coreanos determinan ser triunfadores en campana de 200 dias
articles.content:
Coreanos determinan ser triunfadores en campana de 200 dias
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 2 y 3 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Hwanghae del Sur, de Jagang y de Hamgyong del Sur los mitines multitudinarios para materializar cabalmente la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ser triunfadores en la campana de 200 dias.
					Tomaron parte en las ocasiones los funcionarios, los trabajadores, los jovenes y estudiantes de las instituciones locales del partido, el Poder, la economia y las entidades de masas, las fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades.
					
					Hubo los informes e intervenciones de los delegados de obreros, campesinos, jovenes e intelectuales.
					
					Los oradores exhortaron a los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores a lograr sin parar nuevo record y velocidad en la campana de 200 dias marchando por el camino indicado por el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					La presente campana es la ofensiva general de todo el partido, todo el Estado y todo el pueblo para manifestar una vez mas el impetu y el poderio del pueblo coreano que innova y avanza sin cesar por lograr los exitos continuos uniendose mas compactamente en torno al gran partido, prosiguieron.
					
					Subrayaron que los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben crear milagros e innovaciones en cada campo de batallas principales en acato al llamamiento combativo del partido que les llamo a la campana de 200 dias.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de desplegar de manera ofensiva y consciente la labor ideo-politica en todos los campos de la campana de 200 dias y asi abrir la brecha para el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia estatal. 
					
					Llamaron a aportar activamente a adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche al lograr ininterrumpidamente innovaciones y avance, siendo combatientes de gran marcha heroica de hoy.
					
					A continuacion, hubo manifestaciones de masas.

articles.title: Exhibicion nacional de obras fantasticas y modelos de ninos-2016
articles.content:
Exhibicion nacional de obras fantasticas y modelos de ninos-2016
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea, quedo inaugurada la exhibicion nacional de obras literarias y artisticas y modelos de ciencia fantastica de ninos-2016.
					En la ocasion se exhibieron mas de 310 obras inventadas por los ninos escolares de todo el pais.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 3 en la Casa Central de la Juventud.
					
					Participaron en la ceremonia el jefe de Departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Il Hwan, el primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, los funcionarios de la UJS y los ninos escolares de esta ciudad.

articles.title: Minju Joson conmemora 70o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
Minju Joson conmemora 70o aniversario de su fundacion
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Minju Joson, organo del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, conmemoro el 70o aniversario de la fundacion.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 4 de junio del 35(1946) de la Era Juche el periodico y lo denomino como "Minju Joson". E ilumino los principios y las tareas a mantenerse en la recopilacion y publicacion del periodico en cada etapa de la revolucion en desarrollo y dirigio sabiamente a los periodistas, redactores y empleados para que ellos cumplan satisfactoriamente sus deberes revolucionarios.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il fortalecio y desarrollo el periodico como un poderoso medio de prensa que representa la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					Durante 70 anos pasados, la Editora del Periodico Minju Joson cumplio satisfactoriamente su deber caminando por la senda orgullosa y de desarrollo bajo el amor y la direccion de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					El acto conmemorativo tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo bajo la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam y otros funcionarios, periodistas, redactores y empleados de la Editora.
					
					Hubo informe e intervenciones.
